welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Deutschlandsberg, Austria! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's charming atmosphere and historic landmarks, known for its picturesque landscapes and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything Deutschlandsberg has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Thalerhof Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Thalerhof Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, no password required.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maribor International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Maribor International Airport, handling freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
